name: Eighth-grade teachers who agreed with various statements about using information and communications technologies in teaching at school, by statement: 2018
description: Eighth-grade teachers who agreed with various statements about using information and communications technologies in teaching at school, by statement: 2018

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

notes: The ICILS average is the average of all participating education systems meeting international technical standards, with each education system weighted equally. Statements are ordered by the percentages of U.S. teachers reporting “strongly agree” or “agree” from highest to lowest.
sources: International Association for the Evaluation of Educational Achievement (IEA), ICILS, 2018. https://nces.ed.gov/surveys/icils/icils2018/theme1.asp?tabontop.Science and Engineering Indicators
